TodayEpisode - Class in ajtrl
This Object holds all Infos about a show in the Countdown XML Show ID Show name Show link Episode link Episode title Season and episode number Air date Relative date
TodayEpisode() - Constructor for class ajtrl.TodayEpisode
Default Constructor
TVRageCountdown - Class in ajtrl
Retrieves Infos about upcoming shows which are in TVRages' Countdown XML A TVRage API Key is required in order for this to work
TVRageCountdown(ArrayList<Integer>, String) - Constructor for class ajtrl.TVRageCountdown
Returns provided shows if they are airing today
TVRageCountdown(String) - Constructor for class ajtrl.TVRageCountdown
